tool_description: Analyzes audio tracks to detect silent sections, pauses, and gaps with configurable threshold and duration settings.

track_id.description: Track ID to analyze for silence

min_duration_ms.description: Minimum duration to consider as silence in milliseconds (10 to 10000)

analysis_window_ms.description: Analysis window size in milliseconds (1 to 100)

error_messages: Invalid track ID: The specified track_id does not exist.
Invalid threshold: threshold_db must be between -120 and -10 dB.
Invalid duration: min_duration_ms must be between 10 and 10000 milliseconds.
Invalid window size: analysis_window_ms must be between 1 and 100 milliseconds.
Analysis failed: Unable to analyze the track for silence detection.
usage: Provide track_id to analyze. Adjust threshold_db, min_duration_ms, and analysis_window_ms to fine-tune silence detection sensitivity.

silence_regions.description: Array of silence regions as 'start_time,end_time' strings in seconds

total_silence_duration.description: Total duration of detected silence in seconds

silence_percentage.description: Percentage of track that is silent
